author: Moscadini
title: Small and Simple
review: The title says it all, "Small and Simple" which it is exactly what it is.  I actually got this set with 3 others through Bricklink via someone in Japan.  Yes, it is small...BUT it is the only astronaut without the golden visor.  So, it is a great way to lighten up without the golden visor.  Do ALL astronauts really need it??  Not really...the astronauts inside the space shuttle that don't do space walks don't use them...
